text: Hi community! Just wanted to check if anyone knows how to add E-signers (contact_signers and user_signers) to a quote through the api. I don’t see a property for this, and  i’m checking the template to figure it out, i see an e-signature module. Has anyone done it before?. Thanks!!!
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/quotes>
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/quotes/use-e-signatures-with-quotes>
Thanks! but i actually already check those, i’m looking for a way to add e-signers while building the quote manually or by api through hubl functions
<@U7SL518D6> hey! would you be able to help with this? Thanks
let me show you
{% set contact_associated_inet_accounts = crm_associations( contact_id, ‘USER_DEFINED’, 56) %}
You need to provide the properties parameter to pull in those properties
the returned object is correct, and has the correct ID and inet_account number (one property), but its not showing any of the other properties
Please checkout this part of the docs <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions#crm-associations>
ohhh thank you
let me try that
of course
I was always getting this other link
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/data/crm-objects>
thank you sooo much!!!! it worked!!!
of course, no problem

Hi!
I'm working on custom module. I made it and try to use on blog template
This is a custom heading and looks like this in html: <https://prnt.sc/q6rDlfUvQtiJ>
This is the code of module's fields file: <https://prnt.sc/BM2HBc9lBx6S>
This is how I call this module from article template: <https://prnt.sc/G5FZ3yw5g4Xv>
And this is the result in admin panel on article page: <https://prnt.sc/uv4j1gvNSfaD>. The default value reads like 'module', but it works correcly in the code
Could you help me, please? How I can correcly setup the predefined value for choice field type?

Hi <@U04F6JMAJHF> 

just tried to change variable name Tag. and it’s worked. because same issue faced in my theme as well. when I used TAG as a internal variable name at that time, sometimes Content was lost and default tag text inserted in my text box. I hope it will work at your side as well

Hey <@U04EV429J6M> !
Thank you, it helps me

Hey!
I'm working on the custom module for blog article template
I'm making an optional subheading for posts. When I'm trying to update the custom "Article Subheading" field - some fields are dissappears like article title and tags. The content of this fields appears only page reloading
This is screenshot when I filled the field content and reload the page: <https://prnt.sc/1ULy_tWCjmjN>
And here the screenshot before page reloading, but after updating the custom field: <https://prnt.sc/KMIyCEmGbfla>
Why is this happening? How can I make fields be visible without reloading?
it it worked?
Yes!
